title:
Today's Bible Verse for Children (Hebrews 11:6)
And without faith it is impossible to please God, because...

attachments.displayName:
Today's Bible Verse for Children (Hebrews 11:6)
And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to Him must believe that He exists and that He rewards those who earnestly seek Him.

Today's Devotional for Children
Don't let others discourage you because you love Jesus. As today's Bible verse describes, we will be rewarded for believing and trusting in Him. God says whoever suffers for doing what is right, that the Kingdom of Heaven belongs to them!

http://childrensbibleverse.com/

object.content:
Today's Bible Verse for Children (Hebrews 11:6)
And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to Him must believe that He exists and that He rewards those who earnestly seek Him.

Today's Devotional for Children
Don't let others discourage you because you love Jesus. As today's Bible verse describes, we will be rewarded for believing and trusting in Him. God says whoever suffers for doing what is right, that the Kingdom of Heaven belongs to them!
